name: gridtokenx-app
description: GridTokenX - P2P Energy Trading System with Blockchain

scripts.setup: pnpm run anchor keys sync && pnpm run anchor build && pnpm run codama:js
scripts.ci: pnpm run build && pnpm run lint && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run codama:js

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd frontend && rm -rf dist && cd ../anchor && cargo clean
